text: Yalboroo is a town and locality in the Mackay Region, Queensland, Australia. == History == Yalboroo State School opened on 29 August 1927 and closed on 31 December 2000. Yalbaroo Post Office opened on 1 December 1927, was renamed Yalboroo in April 1961, and closed on 28 February 1975. == Amenties == The Mackay Regional Council operates a mobile library service on a fortnightly schedule at the Community Hall. ==References== == External links == * Town map, 1961 Category:Towns in Queensland Category:Mackay Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Yalboroo, Queensland
